title.rendered: Chick-fil-a + Ladies’ Night Out + GA Atlases

content.rendered:
Story Time at Chick-fil-A

Gottwals Books is joining Chick-fil-A® on February 28th at 5:30 p.m. for Kid’s Club. We’ll be celebrating “Reading Across America Day” with some Dr. Seuss stories! There will also be crafts and giveaways.

Gottwals is also participating in Chick-fil-A’s story time for preschoolers on March 3rd at 10:00 a.m. Events will take place at the Chick-fil-A on HWY 96.

 

Ladies’ Night Out

There is still time to get tickets for Middle Georgia’s 12th annual Ladies’ Night Out! This event benefits the pro-life adoption ministry Covenant Care Adoptions.

The event will feature Babbie Mason who is a performer, speaker, and author. The event is Thursday, March 23rd, at 7:00 p.m. Visit their website (link below) for more information.

You can pick up your tickets at any Gottwals Books location.

https://www.covenantcareadoptions.com/event/ladies-night-babbie-mason/

 

GA Recreation Atlases

Spring is around the corner and warmer weather means more travel opportunities! Explore things to do and see in Georgia with a National Geographic Recreation Atlas. MSRP is $24.95, but you can pick up an atlas at Gottwals Books for only $14.97!
